verses.text_plain: Judge me, O Lord; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the Lord; therefore I shall not slide.
verses.verse_html: 1Judge me, O Lord; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the Lord; therefore I shall not slide.

verses.text_plain: Examine me, O Lord, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
verses.verse_html: 2Examine me, O Lord, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.

verses.text_plain: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
verses.verse_html: 3For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.

verses.text_plain: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.
verses.verse_html: 4I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.

verses.text_plain: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 5I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.

verses.text_plain: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O Lord:
verses.verse_html: 6I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O Lord:

verses.text_plain: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.
verses.verse_html: 7That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.

verses.text_plain: Lord, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
verses.verse_html:
8Lord, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth. ▼
▼ where…: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour

footnotes.body_text: ▼ where…: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour
footnotes.body_html: ▼ where…: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour

verses.text_plain: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
verses.verse_html:
9Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men: ▼
▼ Gather…: or, Take not away
 , ▼
▼ bloody…: Heb. men of blood

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Gather…: or, Take not away
▼ bloody…: Heb. men of blood

verses.text_plain: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
verses.verse_html:
10In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes. ▼
▼ full…: Heb. filled with

footnotes.body_html: ▼ full…: Heb. filled with

verses.text_plain: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
verses.verse_html: 11But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.

tokens.text: But as for me, I will walk

verses.text_plain: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 12My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the Lord.
